response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality, craftsmanship, and historical significance. I am confident it will also bring immense value to your collection or business.

I am offering this product to you at a special price of $800,000. This is a generous discount from its true value, aimed at providing you with an attractive deal while ensuring a substantial return on my investment. Given its rarity and the exclusivity associated with it, this could be an unparalleled chance to own something truly remarkable.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am more than happy to discuss any further details or answer any questions you might have about the product. I believe this could be a mutually beneficial transaction, and I look forward to your positive response.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 800000}
